question: The Integrated Command and Control Centre of which city has recently been inaugurated in Haryana?
explanation: Haryana Chief Minister Manohar Lal Khattar inaugurated Gurgaon\'s ambitious Integrated Command and Control Centre (ICCC), developed as the nerve centre to provide multifaceted online smart services to people. Built at the cost of Rs 38 crore, the ICCC has been designed to serve as the nodal point for all online data related to the Smart City applications, including CCTV-based public safety and adaptive traffic management system, smart parking system, water supply management system, pollution monitoring, property tax management system and asset management system.
